movie.title: Superstar
movie.description_intro: Orphan Mary Katherine Gallagher, an ugly duckling at St. Monica High School, has a dream: to be boned soulfully. She decides she can realize this dream if she becomes a superstar, so her prayers, her fantasies, and her conversations with her only friend focus on achieving super-stardom. Her big chance is a school talent contest; her main competition is Evian, the school fancy water, who is dancing with Sky, the object of Mary Katherine's bone dream. Mary Katherine gets some talent-show help from her fellow special education students, her grandma, and Jesus Gonzales, and inspiration from secrets in her past. Watching are Sky, Evian, and a silent classmate.
movie.description_full: Orphan Mary Katherine Gallagher, an ugly duckling at St. Monica High School, has a dream: to be boned soulfully. Watching are Sky, Evian, and a silent classmate.

movies.title: Meet the Browns
movies.summary: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.
movies.description_full: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.
movies.synopsis: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.

movies.title: The One I Love
movies.summary: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.
movies.description_full: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.
movies.synopsis: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.summary: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive. Millions of miles away, NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring "the Martian" home, while his crewmates concurrently plot a daring, if not impossible, rescue mission. As these stories of incredible bravery unfold, the world comes together to root for Watney's safe return.

movies.title: The Mexican
movies.summary: Jerry Welbach is given two ultimatums. His mob boss wants him to travel to Mexico to get a priceless antique pistol called "The Mexican" or he will suffer the consequences. The other ultimatum comes from his girlfriend Samantha, who wants him to end his association with the mob. Jerry figures that being alive, although in trouble with his girlfriend is the better alternative so he heads south of the border. Finding the pistol is easy but getting it home is a whole other matter. The pistol supposedly carries a curse - a curse Jerry is given every reason to believe, especially when Samantha is held hostage by the gay hit man Leroy to ensure the safe return of the pistol.
